'''Kartaklys''' was a [[Netherese]] [[archwizard]].
document_data.History: In {{YearlinkConvert|2884|NY}}, this archwizard began to create his own [[Netherese enclave|flying enclave]], and started the crucial stage of shaving off the top of a mountain. It was believed that a rival archwizard, [[Buoyance]], interrupted Kartaklys' plans by casting ''[[trap the soul]]'' on him. Kartaklys, his life-force trapped, was unable to react as the mountain top fell atop him, ending his life.
